description: Tough as nails Amber Rayne gets another extremely challenging suspension in part 2 of her live show. Each ankle and each wrist is tied down and she is suspended only by her hips in a back breaking incredibly hot arch. We see her body try and relax and test the limits of her pain processing abilities with wax, caning, heavy neck play / choking, a very cruel crotch rope... building all the pain into immense pleasure and mind blowing orgasms.
title: Amber Rayne Live Show Part 2 - Drawn and Quartered
